name: restarting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
restart
C1 to start something again: Our car stalled and wouldn't restart. Please restart your computer to complete installation.
More examplesFewer examplesA freed inmate wants to restart his life.We can restart this case at any time.The plan was to restart nuclear reactors to make explosive tritium for weapons.
